mapper.select: select * from INSHCarowneinfo where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
delete from INSHCarowneinfo where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}

update INSHCarowneinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},personid = #{personid},fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi},nodecode = #{nodecode} where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
